thread.title: Best Buy releases list of top tech gifts, offers free shipping starting Sunday
thread.title_full: Best Buy releases list of top tech gifts, offers free shipping starting Sunday

author: Doreen Christensen
title: Best Buy releases list of top tech gifts, offers free shipping starting Sunday
text:
Best Buy gets a jump on holiday shopping, releasing top tech gifts and offers free shipping starting Sunday 
The holiday shopping madness has begun six weeks before Black Friday. 
Best Buy is getting a big jump on competitors this holiday shopping by offering free shipping starting Sunday, according to a release. 
The big-box retailer released its Top 15 Tech Gifts for 2015, based on a consumer survey, and will offer free shipping with no minimum order starting Sunday, Oct. 25 through Jan. 2, according to a release on Thursday. 
Normally, shipping is free with $35 purchases. 
New this year, stores also will offer free setup by the Geek Squad with purchase of qualifying tech gifts starting Nov. 1. See what qualifies at BestBuy.com/FreeSetup. 
Here's the list: 2. Bose QuietComfort 25 Noise Cancelling Headphones3. MacBook4. Samsung 48” Smart 4K Ultra HD TV5. Sharp 43” Smart HDTV with Roku6. Microsoft Surface7. Bose SoundLink Mini Bluetooth Speaker II8. Fitbit Charge HR Heart Rate and Activity Tracker9. Samsung Galaxy Tab S210. Dyson V6 Absolute Bagless Cordless Vacuum11. Vizio 43” Smart 4K Ultra HD TV12. Apple Watch13. SONOS PLAY:1 Wireless Speaker14. iRobot Roomba Vacuum Cleaning Robot15. GoPro HERO4 Action Camera
